name: Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description: A vulnerability that allows attackers to execute code remotely by exploiting a weakness in the management interface.
solution: Update firmware to version 15.2(4)M6 or later, and disable internet access to the management interface.

name: Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
description: A vulnerability that allows attackers to bypass authentication and gain access to the live video feed.
solution: Upgrade the firmware to version 7.11.2 or higher, and change the default passwords.

name: Information Disclosure Vulnerability
description: A vulnerability that could allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information from the system.
solution: Update VMware Tools to the latest version and apply security patches.
